trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert a string of comma-separated values to and from an array of strings.
trans-unit.target: 提供類型轉換器，將以逗號分隔值的字串與字串的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The StringArrayConverter class converts a string of comma-separated values to and from an array of strings.
trans-unit.target: StringArrayConverter 類別字串，轉換為逗號分隔值與字串的陣列。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertTo%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> methods to perform the type conversions.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertTo%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法來執行類型轉換。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: This type converter is used by design-time environments to provide values for display in the property grid control for a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 此型別轉換子正由設計階段環境提供指定的型別在屬性方格控制項中顯示的值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您應該永遠不會直接存取型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 請改為呼叫適當的轉換程式，使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor?displayProperty=fullName>類別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>中的範例

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter"></xref> can convert the specified source type to an array of strings.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter"></xref>可以將指定的來源類型轉換成字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: The CanConvertFrom method determines whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter> can convert the object specified by `sourceType` to an array of strings.
trans-unit.target: CanConvertFrom 方法會判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter>可以轉換所指定的物件`sourceType`字串的陣列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter>

trans-unit.source: Use this method prior to calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method to perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法之前呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法，以執行轉換。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that provides a format context that can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>物件，提供格式內容，可用來擷取要從中叫用這個轉換子的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數或這個參數的屬性可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>轉換。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果轉換子可以執行作業。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified comma-separated string into an array of strings.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的以逗號分隔字串轉換成字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: The ConvertFrom method parses an object that represents a comma-separated string into an array of strings.
trans-unit.target: ConvertFrom 方法剖析物件，表示為字串陣列的以逗號分隔的字串。

trans-unit.source: Prior to calling this method, you can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method to determine whether the object specified by `value` can be converted to an array of strings.
trans-unit.target: 在之前呼叫這個方法，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>方法來判斷所指定的物件是否`value`可以轉換成字串陣列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: To convert an array of strings into a comma-separated string, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將字串的陣列轉換成以逗號分隔的字串，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertTo%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that provides a format context that can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>物件，提供格式內容，可用來擷取要從中叫用這個轉換子的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數或這個參數的屬性可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>轉換。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: 表示的轉換後 value 。

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed because value is not a string.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行轉換，因為 value 不是字串。

trans-unit.source: Converts an array of strings into a string of values separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 將字串的陣列轉換成以逗號分隔值的字串。

trans-unit.source: The ConvertTo method converts an array of strings into a comma-separated string.
trans-unit.target: ConvertTo 方法會將字串的陣列轉換成以逗號分隔的字串。

trans-unit.source: To convert a comma-separated string into an array of strings, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將以逗號分隔的字串轉換成字串陣列，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StringArrayConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that provides a format context that can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>物件，提供格式內容，可用來擷取要從中叫用這個轉換子的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數或這個參數的屬性可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>轉換。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to convert `value` to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>轉換`value`以。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An instance that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: 表示已轉換的執行個體 value 。

trans-unit.source: destinationType is not of type .
trans-unit.target: destinationType類型不是。
